attributes.action: Stop newspapers discriminating Muslims using it as form of identifying criminals
attributes.background: Daily mail reported a person wearing the Islamic gear as threatening and insulting towards two other innocent people. Instead of using another description to describe the person that did the insult, daily mail used Muslim to describe the persons identity. Please help us to stop this discrimination.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
